long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Google BigQuery UX with a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your workflow and optimize your interaction with BigQuery's interface. 

The extension offers a range of tools and shortcuts tailored to both Mac and Windows users.

Key Features:

Keyboard Shortcuts:
Switch Between Tabs, Open a New Tab, Close a Tab

Cost Evaluation:
Get instant access to on-demand compute pricing estimation,

Query Formatter:
Enhance your queries with a more compact and prettier SQL formatter.

Tab Renaming:
Easily rename any tab by double-clicking on the tab name. This allows for a more organized workspace without the need to save the query.
